summary: Sex and love. Some seek it, some need it, some spurn it, and some pay for it, but we're all involved in it. Set on one afternoon on Hampstead Heath, London, this movie investigates the minutiae of seven couples. What makes us tick?
cast: Holly Aird|Eileen Atkins|Hugh Bonneville|Tom Hardy|Douglas Hodge|Adrian Lester|Andrew Lincoln|Ewan McGregor|Gina McKee|Elle Mckenzie|Sophie Okonedo|Eglantine Rembauville-Nicolle|Nicholas Sidi|Mark Strong|Catherine Tate|Polly Walker|Benjamin Whitrow|Aschlin Ditta|Melissa Thompson|Brian Callaghan|Spencer Stafford|Onion|Lorraine Kelly
title: Scenes of a Sexual Nature
